title: MIRROR EXERCISE WITH DR. PARET/ NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS MASTERCLASS
description:
Fascination - the power of the gaze, is the main key to non-verbal hypnosis. For one therapist, to have a good gaze, he must do specific exercises. The mirror exercise is a great way to enhance the power of the gaze and also to hypnotize yourself. In this video, you will see Dr. Paret's students doing the mirror exercise in his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass.
